definition: (mining) a unit of volume (equal to 6 cubic feet) used in measuring bodies of ore, measure the depth of (a body of water) with a sounding line
details:
noun
- (mining) a unit of volume (equal to 6 cubic feet) used in measuring bodies of ore
= synonyms: fthm
- a linear unit of measurement (equal to 6 feet) for water depth
verb
- measure the depth of (a body of water) with a sounding line
= synonyms: sound
- come to understand
= synonyms: penetrate
